Justification: To assess the range of motion of the neck and identify any limitations or pain with movement.
To palpate for any tenderness, muscle spasm, or bony abnormalities in the neck.
To assess the alignment of the spine and identify any deformities or misalignments.
To assess the strength and function of the muscles in the neck and shoulders.
To assess the sensation in the neck, shoulders, and arms.
To assess the reflexes in the upper extremities.
